=Active Hubs=

We have four hubs currently that demonstrate implemented INCF Atlas functions.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/DeegreeActiveHubLinks#Central Central]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/DeegreeActiveHubLinks#ABA_Hub ABA Hub]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/DeegreeActiveHubLinks#EMAP_Hub EMAP Hub]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/DeegreeActiveHubLinks#UCSD_Hub UCSD Hub]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/DeegreeActiveHubLinks#WHS_Hub WHS Hub]

See the [http://code.google.com/p/incf-dai/wiki/AtlasFunctionHubApplicabilityTable applicability table] for which WPS functions are implemented or planned to be implemented at each of the hubs.

Currently the project is using four servers to develop and demonstrate the hubs and functions.

==Working Example Requests/Processes==


===Central===

====Atlas Processes====

 * !GetCapabilities

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/central/atlas?service=WPS&request=GetCapabilities

 * !DescribeProcess

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/central/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=DescribeProcess&Identifier=ALL

 * Execute : Addition (a test process)

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/central/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=Addition&DataInputs=a=1;b=2

===ABA Hub===

====Atlas Processes====

 * !GetCapabilities

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/aba/atlas?service=WPS&request=GetCapabilities

 * !DescribeProcess

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=DescribeProcess&Identifier=ALL

 * Execute : Get2DImagesByPOI

    http://incf-dev-local.crbs.ucsd.edu/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=Get2DImagesByPOI&DataInputs=srsName=Mouse_AGEA_1.0;x=6600;y=4000;z=5600;filter=maptype:coronal

 * Execute : TransformPOI

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=TransformPOI&DataInputs=transformationCode=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0_To_Mouse_AGEA_1.0_v1.0;x=1;y=112;z=162

 * Execute : !GetTransformationChain

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=GetTransformationChain&DataInputs=inputSrsName=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0;outputSrsName=Mouse_WHS_0.9;filter=cerebellum

 * Execute : GetStructureNamesByPOI

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=GetStructureNamesByPOI&DataInputs=srsName=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0;x=280;y=112;z=162;vocabulary=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0;filter=structureset:fine

 * Execute : !ListTransformations

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=ListTransformations&DataInputs=inputSrsName=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0;outputSrsName=Mouse_WHS_1.0;filter=cerebellum

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=ListTransformations

 * Execute : GetCorrelationMapByPOI

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=GetCorrelationMapByPOI&DataInputs=srsName=Mouse_ABAvoxel_1.0;x=263;y=159;z=227;filter=maptype:coronal


 * Execute : ListSRS

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=ListSRSs

 * Execute : DescribeSRS

    http://132.239.131.188:8080/aba/atlas?service=WPS&version=1.0.0&request=Execute&Identifier=DescribeSRS&DataInputs=srsName=Mouse_ABAreference_1.0
